text: Grand Bay is a village in the south of Dominica. It is known officially as Berekua or Berricoa. 2,288 people lived in the town in 2010.Commonwealth of Dominica, Population and Housing Census â€” 2001. Roseau, Dominica: Central Statistical Office, Ministry of Finance and Planning, Kennedy Avenue, 2001. It is the capital city for St. Patrick Parish. ==References== Category:Geography of Dominica Category:Villages in North America
title: Grand Bay, Dominica
